content:
The Malka Baum nee Schonfeld Family


_________________________________________________________________
From: BMosko5809@aol.com
Date: Mon, 10 Sep 2001 22:27:26 EDT
Subject: tzvi elimelech klar
To: moishe@langsam.com
X-Mailer: AOL 6.0 for Windows US sub 10536

hi        i hope you know who i am,  my great grandparents name is mordechy    
                  fridman  from stropkov  his wifes name is sheindil  his 
mothers name is hinde golde         and they r conected to pesach avruhom 
schonfeld the son of reb moishe schonfeld            and the soninlaw of reb 
ezriel green from muncatch,  i hope you can help me find the     conection,    
and my fathers name moshe elye ben nachmen ben yechiel mechil he       was 
married to a urowits, ill appriciate any help,,,,,   thank you so much,        
                     please let me know that you got the letter, thanks ,,,,, 
_________________________________________________________________
Date: Sun, 09 Sep 2001 21:37:56 -0400
To: melodya@inter.net.il, Petronets@aol.com 
From: "moishe@langsam.com" <moishe@langsam.com>
Subject: Fwd: tzvi elimelech klar
Cc: BMosko5809@aol.com

Dear Ezra and Melody,

This may be of interest to both of you. A Stropkov contact claiming descent 
from R' Ezriel Green and the Bnei Yissochur. His name is Hersh Klar and I met 
with him this afternoon. He gave permission to give out his phone number. He 
lives in Williamsburg at 718 384 5038. His cell is 646 739 4255. He said 
Mordche Friedman, his maternal grandfather, was born in around 1890's, lived 
in Stropkov and perished in the Holocaust. I do not see the family on the The 
Jews of Stropkov, 1942-1945: Their Names, Their Fate webpage at
http://www.jewishgen.org/Yizkor/stropkov1/str001.html
His grandfather:Ezriel Friedman, son of Mordche and Shaindel. Mordche's mother 
was Hinde Golda. 

I do know that R' Pesach Avrohm Schonfeld, son-in-law of R' Ezriel Green, was ABD 
Kurima. He had a son-in-law named Moshe Baum from Stropkov. Perhaps that is his 
connection. Any ideas or thoughts?

By the way, let me introduce you to each other. Ezra Holczer is researching R' 
Ezriel Green. Melody Amsel is researching Stropkov. Hersh Klar is my cousin through 
Pesach Langsam. He is even more closely related through my maternal (Yurowitz) line.

Any ideas as to his ancestry to R' Hersh Mylech Spira, the Bnei Yissochur?

L'shana Tova!
Moishe Miller
Brooklyn NY
moishe@langsam.com

PS: Hersh, can you tell us the family name of R' Mordche's wife, Shaindel?
_________________________________________________________________


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 5/7/02
